concept.author: Cathie Ryan
concept.title: JavaScript
concept.shortdesc: Programming language that turns your webpages into a program. test

conbody.p: JavaScript is a programming language that you use with your webpages to turn webpages into a program. It allows the developer to gather input and manipulate the webpage after the webpage has been loaded.
Javascript is deeply embedded with the browser. It uses an event driven model which means that the event is not run until the event is triggered.
